net.sf.freecol.client

Class Worker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.sf.freecol.client.Worker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class Worker
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Worker Thread executes jobs one after another. The thread manages a queue where new jobs can be enqueued. The jobs are processed synchronously by the worker.

    • Nested Class Summary
